comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Sorry, just got in.

We had a hardware failure that we’re working to resolve.

EDIT: The failure was in the Frankfurt datacenter, so if you route your requests to Dallas (via 64.25.40.51) they should start working again.

EDIT2: Things should be coming back online now. Sorry about the mess!

comments.author: Elrey.5472
comments.body:
Marina Del Firen.5146:

Same for me.
When I copy/paste my api keys on gw2 efficiency (or other websites) that doesn’t work.
I have an error message : “This API key is not valid”.
But my key works other days.

It’s easier to access to the API directly and see if it loads: https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/build
